alert.note: Alert for Columbia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 02 at 2:44PM EST until December 02 at 3:30PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Central Columbia County in northern Florida... * Until 330 PM EST. * At 244 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Wellborn, or 7 miles west of Lake City, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Lake City, Winfield, and Five Points around 250 PM EST. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
